en.company: Bern University of Applied Sciences, Switzerland
en.summary: The internship in Switzerland is all about Wikidata, its design, and organization. I’m working on the generalization of the interfaces for Wikidata.

highlights.1: Applied Lean Organization and DevOps to Government
highlights.2: Applied Continous Delivery and Agile Development concept to Government Team
highlights.3: Generalize Wikidata information to a single abstract interface

th.company: ธนาคารกสิกรไทย
